title: Apple's Smart Glasses: Two Models in Development, Powered by Custom Chips
excerpt: Apple is developing two smart glasses models — one with AR and one without — powered by a custom chip based on Apple Watch tech. Expected by 2026–2027, the project marks Apple's deeper push into wearable AI and spatial computing.
